text: Boxing has featured as a sport at the Youth Olympic Summer Games since its first edition in 2010. The Youth Olympic Games are multi-sport event and the games are held every four years just like the Olympic Games. ==Editions== Games Year Events 1 2010 11 (11M+0W) 2 2014 13 (10M+3W) 3 2018 13 (9M+4W) 4 2026 10 (5M+5W) ==Medal table== :As of the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics. ==Related pages== *Boxing at the Summer Olympics ==Other websites== *Youth Olympic Games
title: Boxing at the Youth Olympic Games
